text: Will Whiteness History Month make all white people hate themselves? Will white students cry themselves to sleep for the rest of their lives?  Hahahahahaha. This makes me very happy. The whole idea sounds a little bit ridiculous but it s bound to spark some real political hostility! Hoorah for PCC.

Um. Bernie supporters attack. Thom Hartmann a liar. Definitely time to step away from the mike. Lousy timing, but there you are. Politics is personal. Always has been. Always will be. It s neither for the faint of heart nor the intrinsically correct. It s an election. Put on your big boy underpants and stand up.
Yet call out all Muslims for the acts of a few will get you pilloried. So why is it okay to smear an entire religion over these few idiots? Or is this because it s okay to bash Christian sects?
